Text: No niin poijjaat ! Avast 5 ilmoittaa seuraavaa : VTS_01_1.VOB,"VOB,VOB ja VOB File is a decompression bomb.(42000) joten alkää väittäkö että näin ei ole. Jos koko filmi on .iso elikäe valmiiksi poltettava ei tarvita tiivistettyjä kansioita. Tarkistakaa alkuperäinen materiaalinne. Voi olla että joku imuttaja lisä tämän paskan mutta ei se ainakaan turvallinen ole. DO NOT DOWNLOAD contains decompression bombs !

false positive:
decompression bomb is just something that unpacks to an unusually big amount of data even though it's rather small (i.e. has a high compression ratio, for example). It's nothing to worry about, you are just informed that avast!

My point is that you have a ready to burn .iso file. Why ARE there 4 decompresion files in the package ? Look up what decompression files are capable of doing ! espesially those who watch the movie through their PC. When/if the bomb opens, it screws up the virus detection and a virus might be in the bomb so your CPU is fucked up. Why take he risk ? Get your data cleared up !
